item.title: August Locks
item.description: In order to create a simplified store experience, we completely rewrote the frontend cart and checkout experience in Magento 1.9.x. Fraud protection, Stripe payment gateway, and a custom warehouse/inventory integration were also implemented to streamline the back office experience.
